description: Protecting files too Important to lose
overview:
Backup Circle’s customised hardware and software design will offer your New Zealand customers users a truly economical way to protect their precious data, where their data is backed-up and hosted right here in NZ. Backup Circle has been designed to be a simple and easy to use application. We are the first in NZ to offer:

1) Data is hosted in NZ – Our Servers are all hosted in NZ, customers data never leaves the country

2) Affordable – Backup Circle will be available for as low as a few cents per gigabyte per month

3) Security – Your customer’s data is encrypted using 256 bit before transmission. We store all data encrypted, Backup Circle handles key management and key protection for you. Backup Circle uses one of the strongest block ciphers available, 256-bit Advanced Encryption Standard (AES-256). 256-bit is the largest key size defined for AES.

4) Version control –Your customers will have an unlimited number of versions, they are only limited by their account size.

5) Durable – The service redundantly stores data in multiple devices within our facility. To increase durability, Backup Circle synchronously stores customer data across multiple facilities before returning SUCCESS on uploading archives. Backup Circle performs regular, systematic data integrity checks and is built to be automatically self-healing

6) Backup by File Type –Customers should not have to worry about where their photos or documents are stored; just find them and make it easy

7) Detail Reporting – Backup Circle provides detailed reporting e.g. Backup/Recovery success & failures, storage availability etc.

8) Seeded Backup/Recovery – Ensures that for customers who do not have large data plans they can still get their initial backup or full recovery without using up their data plan allowance

9) Any time anywhere access to your data – Your customer can log in via our website to access their data
